page.title: 20Scunthorpe Domesday Project
page.content: Children from five Junior schools took part in the project. These schools were{Ashby, Brumby, Grange {Lane, Lincoln Gardens}and{Rochdale {Road.}The children collected some data and wrote almost all the text. Their work was coordinated by students at{John Leggott Sixth Form {College,}who opted for this project as a Wednesday afternoon{General Studies activity. The John Leggott students collected some data and selected, edited and typed the text. The children of Grange Lane Junior School had particular difficulty because their school was broken into and{vandalised,}much of their work being damaged.
